description: The initiative revolves around Tucuy, a company that produces healthy frozen products made from guinea pig, a traditional Peruvian meat. Founded by a passionate entrepreneur, the brand offers items like hamburgers, sausages, and nuggets, targeting health-conscious consumers, including those with anemia and oncology patients. The initiative aims to promote the nutritional benefits of guinea pig meat while innovating its presentation to appeal to a broader audience, thus creating new consumption opportunities in Peru.
name: Tucuy
